oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Successful Ostrich hunting foretold by the coming of a moth (Celœna renisigma, Walker). In the Katkop dialect, by Díä!kwãin (L V.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |goro A Bushman belief about a moth called , the coming of which to the fire at night foretells the slaying of an ostrich (or the finding of ostrich eggs) by one of the men
